item.title: Postgres setup for local development using Docker
item.description: Installing postgres the traditional way may not be very convenient for many reasons. This post describes how to run postgres for local development using docker and docker compose. There’s already some amount of documentation for official postgresql official docker image. But few things are less than obvious if you’re a beginner like me. Running postgres as standalone docker container First pull the docker container using docker pull postgres Only required configuration for running this image is POSTGRES_PASSWORD.
